trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento si verifica quando un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> viene aggiunto o rimosso da una raccolta gestita di tali elenchi.

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento non viene generato quando viene modificato un singolo elemento dell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> quando viene chiamato il relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> metodi vengono eseguiti.

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
A value that specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore che specifica se un oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> è stato aggiunto o rimosso dall'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Insieme di elementi dell'elenco dopo l'applicazione dell'azione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento, il `relatedObject` parametro sempre riferimento il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> che il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> è associato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> associati all'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> that represents the current state of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> che rappresenta lo stato corrente dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto recuperato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> rappresenta lo stato della raccolta dopo l'evento, che comportato l'aggiunta o rimozione di un elemento, è stato applicato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un flag che indica se un elemento è stato aggiunto o rimosso dall'insieme degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType" /> that indicates the type of change.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType" /> che indica il tipo di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se si modifica il contenuto di un oggetto esistente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> nella raccolta non genererà un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto associato all'insieme degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the managed <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> proprietà consente al programmatore di associare un oggetto a un'istanza di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento, il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> deve sempre fare riferimento a proprietà di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> che il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> è associato.
